Dramatična akcija v Pivki: policija prijela oboroženega Ljubljančana (27)
Grozil je in izsiljeval.
06 Nov 2019, 07:44 by T. V.



Simbolična fotografija. FOTO: Roman Šipić, Delo



Zasežena droga. FOTO: Policija


PIVKA – V torek, 29. oktobra, dopoldne je policija v Pivki prijela 27-letnega Ljubljančana, ki je v začetku oktobra z nožem in pištolo grozil ter izsiljeval dva moška z območja Postojne. Pri prijetju so poleg policistov PP Postojna sodelovali tudi kriminalisti sektorja kriminalistične policije PU Koper, saj je bilo glede na zbrana obvestil mogoče sklepati, da je moški lahko nevaren in oborožen.Med prijetjem se je dejansko potrdilo, da gre za nevarno osebo, saj je imel pri sebi pištolo znamke Beretta, za katero nima nobenih uradnih dovoljenj. Ob prijetju so mu jo zasegli.Policisti in kriminalisti so pričeli preiskavo na podlagi podanih prijav in operativnega dela na terenu v oktobru. Policisti PP Postojna so prišli na sled 27-letniku iz Ljubljane, ki so ga utemeljeno osumili izsiljevanja. Mlajšega moškega iz Postojne je namreč izsiljeval za manjši namišljen denarni dolg ter pri tem izsiljevanje še večkrat podkrepil z raznimi grožnjami, med katerimi je omenjal tudi orožje. Prav tako je izvršil kaznivo dejanje lahke telesne poškodbe, saj je nekega drugega moškega z območja Postojne s pestjo udaril v obraz in mu poškodoval ličnico.


Zasežena droga. FOTO: Policija

Na podlagi pridobljene odredbe sodišča so policisti in kriminalisti v Postojni opravili hišno preiskavo stanovanja, ki ga 27-letnik občasno uporablja, in osebnega avtomobila. Med hišno preiskavo so zasegli nož, skoraj kilogram heroina in približno 3,5 kilograma še neidentificirane prašnate snovi, za katero se sumi, da jo je uporabljal za mešanje s prepovedano drogo zaradi povečanja količine, večjo količino gotovine in razne pripomočke, namenjene pakiranju in nadaljnjemu razpečevanju prepovedane droge (elektronske tehtnice, ročna kovinska stiskalnica …).Vrednost zasežene prepovedane droge (brez dodane primesi) bi na trgu znašala približno 40.000 evrov. Glede na navedene ugotovitve je obstajal tudi utemeljen sum storitve neupravičene proizvodnje in prometa s prepovedanimi drogami, za kar je bilo 27-letniku tudi odrejeno pridržanje. Ljubljančan je bil v preteklosti že obravnavan zaradi storitve kaznivih dejanj s področja premoženjskih deliktov in nasilja (kaznivo dejanje napad na uradno osebo, ko ta opravlja naloge varnosti), zaradi česar je bil že pravnomočno obsojen.Na podlagi vseh zbranih obvestil in dokazov je bil 30. oktobra s kazensko ovadbo priveden k preiskovalnemu sodniku v Kopru, ta pa je zanj odredil pripor.

Dramatic action in Pivka: police arrest armed Ljubljana man (27)
He threatened and blackmailed her.
06 Nov 2019, 07:44 by T.V.



Symbolic photography. PHOTO: Roman Sipic, Delo



Seized drug. PHOTO: Police


PIVKA - On Tuesday, October 29, police in Pivka arrested a 27-year-old Ljubljana man who threatened and blackmail two men from the Postojna area in early October with a knife and a gun. In addition to the police officers of the Postojna Police Station, the arrests included criminal investigators from the criminal police sector of the Police Station of Koper, since according to the information collected, it was possible to conclude that the man could be dangerous and armed.The arrests actually confirmed that he was a dangerous person, since he had a Beretta pistol with no official licenses. He was seized when arrested. Police officers and criminal investigators opened an investigation based on reports filed and operational work in the field in October. Police officers of Postojna police tracked down a 27-year-old from Ljubljana who was suspected of blackmail. The younger man from Postojna was blackmailed for a lesser imaginary monetary debt, and further reinforced the extortion by various threats, among which he mentioned weapons. He also committed the crime of light bodily harm by stabbing another man in the Postojna area with his fist and injuring his cheek.


Seized drug. PHOTO: Police

Based on a court order obtained, police officers and criminals in Postojna conducted a house search of an apartment, which the 27-year-old occasionally uses, and a car. A knife, nearly a kilogram of heroin and about 3.5 kilograms of unidentified powdered substance, which was suspected of being used to mix with a narcotics drug for seizure, large amounts of cash and various accessories intended for packaging and further seizure, were seized during a house search drug trafficking (electronic scales, hand-held metal press, etc.). The value of the seized drug (without admixture) would be around € 40,000 on the market. In the light of the above findings, there was also a reasonable suspicion of unlawful production and trafficking of illicit drugs, and the 27-year-old was ordered detained. In the past, the Ljubljana citizen has been considered for committing crimes in the field of property crimes and violence (the offense of assaulting an official while performing security duties), which led to his conviction. was brought to Koper with an investigative judge on criminal charges, who ordered his detention on remand.
